# bunny Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "bunny" {
  api_key = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
  api_url = "https://api.bunny.net"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String) API key
- `api_url` (String) API URL
- `stream_api_url` (String) Stream API URL
